Fields.Name: id
Fields.Description: An account ID

Fields.Name: number
Fields.Description: Use the `accountNumberDisplay` field. Starting July 1, 2021 the `number` field will sunset with limited support until April 1, 2022, at which time it will be deprecated (no longer available).

Fields.Name: accountNumberDisplay
Fields.Description:
The account number from a financial institution in truncated format:
* Last four digits: "1234"
* Last four digits with suffix: "1234-9"
* Full value for string accounts: "john@gmail.com"

Fields.Name: realAccountNumberLast4
Fields.Description: The last 4 digits of the ACH account number

Fields.Name: name
Fields.Description: The account name from the institution

Fields.Name: balance
Fields.Description: The cleared balance of the account as of `balanceDate`

Fields.Name: type
Fields.Description:
The list of supported account types.
* "checking": Standard checking
* "savings": Standard savings
* "cd": Certificates of deposit
* "moneyMarket": Money Market
* "creditCard": Standard credit cards
* "lineOfCredit": Home equity, line of credit
* "investment": Generic investment (no details)
* "investmentTaxDeferred": Generic tax-advantaged investment (no details)
* "employeeStockPurchasePlan": ESPP, Employee Stock Ownership Plans (ESOP), Stock Purchase Plans
* "ira": Individual Retirement Account (not Rollover or Roth)
* "401k": 401K Plan
* "roth": Roth IRA, Roth 401K
* "403b": 403B Plan
* "529plan": 529 Plan (True value is 529)
* "rollover": Rollover IRA
* "ugma": Uniform Gifts to Minors Act
* "utma": Uniform Transfers to Minors Act
* "keogh": Keogh Plan
* "457plan": 457 Plan (True value is 457)
* "401a": 401A Plan
* "brokerageAccount": Brokerage Account
* "educationSavings": Education Savings Account that is not a 529
* "healthSavingsAccount": HSA (Health Savings Accounts)
* "pension": Pension
* "profitSharingPlan": Profit Sharing Plan
* "roth401k": Roth 401K
* "sepIRA": Simplified Employee Pension IRA
* "simpleIRA": Simple IRA
* "thriftSavingsPlan": Thrift Savings Plan
* "variableAnnuity": Variable Annuity
* "cryptocurrency": Cryptocurrency Wallet, Cryptocurrency Account
* "mortgage": Standard Mortgages
* "loan": Auto loans, equity loans, other loans
* "studentLoan": Student Loan
* "studentLoanGroup": Student Loan Group
* "studentLoanAccount": Student Loan Account

Fields.Name: aggregationStatusCode
Fields.Description: The status of the most recent aggregation attempt (see [Aggregation Status Codes](https://docs.finicity.com/aggregation-status-codes/)). Won't be present until you have run your first aggregation for the account.

Fields.Name: status
Fields.Description: "pending" during account discovery, always "active" following successful account activation

Fields.Name: customerId
Fields.Description: A customer ID. See Add Customer API for how to create a customer ID.

Fields.Name: institutionId
Fields.Description: The ID of a financial institution

Fields.Name: balanceDate
Fields.Description: A timestamp showing when the balance was captured. A date in Unix epoch time (in seconds). See: [Handling Epoch Dates and Times](https://docs.finicity.com/endpoint-syntax-and-format/).

Fields.Name: aggregationSuccessDate
Fields.Description: A timestamp showing the last successful aggregation of the account. This will not be present until you have run your first aggregation for the account. A date in Unix epoch time (in seconds). See: [Handling Epoch Dates and Times](https://docs.finicity.com/endpoint-syntax-and-format/).

Fields.Name: aggregationAttemptDate
Fields.Description: A timestamp showing the last aggregation attempt, whether successful or not. This will not be present until you have run your first aggregation for the account. A date in Unix epoch time (in seconds). See: [Handling Epoch Dates and Times](https://docs.finicity.com/endpoint-syntax-and-format/).

Fields.Name: createdDate
Fields.Description: A timestamp showing when the account was added to the system. A date in Unix epoch time (in seconds). See: [Handling Epoch Dates and Times](https://docs.finicity.com/endpoint-syntax-and-format/).

Fields.Name: currency
Fields.Description: A currency code

Fields.Name: lastTransactionDate
Fields.Description: The date of the latest transaction on the account. This will not be present until you have run your first aggregation for the account. A date in Unix epoch time (in seconds). See: [Handling Epoch Dates and Times](https://docs.finicity.com/endpoint-syntax-and-format/).

Fields.Name: oldestTransactionDate
Fields.Description: The date of the oldest transaction in the transactions for the account. A date in Unix epoch time (in seconds). See: [Handling Epoch Dates and Times](https://docs.finicity.com/endpoint-syntax-and-format/).

Fields.Name: institutionLoginId
Fields.Description: An institution login ID (from the account record), represented as a number

Fields.Name: detail
Fields.Description: Additional customer account details. Not all data points will return for each account type. You can see the account type that each data point will return for in descriptions. The data point are also subject to availability by the institution.

Fields.Name: position
Fields.Description: Investment holdings

Fields.Name: displayPosition
Fields.Description: Display position of the account at the financial institution, "1" being the top listed account

Fields.Name: parentAccount
Fields.Description: The assigned account ID for the account one level higher in the student loan account hierarchy

Fields.Name: id
Fields.Description: The id of the investment position

Fields.Name: description
Fields.Description: The description of the holding

Fields.Name: symbol
Fields.Description: The investment position's market ticker symbol

Fields.Name: units
Fields.Description: The number of units of the holding

Fields.Name: currentPrice
Fields.Description: The current price of the investment holding

Fields.Name: securityName
Fields.Description: The security name for the investment holding

Fields.Name: transactionType
Fields.Description: The transaction type of the holding, such as cash, margin, and more

Fields.Name: marketValue
Fields.Description: Market value of an investment position at the time of retrieval

Fields.Name: costBasis
Fields.Description: The total cost of acquiring the security

Fields.Name: status
Fields.Description: The status of the holding

Fields.Name: currentPriceDate
Fields.Description: A date in Unix epoch time (in seconds). See: [Handling Epoch Dates and Times](https://docs.finicity.com/endpoint-syntax-and-format/).

Fields.Name: securityType
Fields.Description: Type of security for the investment position

Fields.Name: mfType
Fields.Description: Type of mutual fund, such as open ended

Fields.Name: posType
Fields.Description: Fund type assigned by the FI (long or short)

Fields.Name: totalGLDollar
Fields.Description: Total gain and loss of the position at the time of aggregation in dollars

Fields.Name: totalGLPercent
Fields.Description: Total gain and loss of the position at the time of aggregation in percentage

Fields.Name: optionStrikePrice
Fields.Description: The strike price of the option contract

Fields.Name: optionType
Fields.Description: The type of option contract (PUT or CALL)

Fields.Name: optionSharesPerContract
Fields.Description: The number of shares per option contract

Fields.Name: optionExpireDate
Fields.Description: Expiration date of option

Fields.Name: fiAssetClass
Fields.Description: Financial Institution (FI) defined asset class (COMMON STOCK, COMNEQTY, EQUITY/STOCK, CMA-ISA, CONVERTIBLE PREFERREDS, CORPORATE BONDS, OTHER MONEY FUNDS, ALLOCATION FUNDS, CMA-TAXABLE, FOREIGNEQUITYADRS, COMMONSTOCK, PREFERRED STOCKS, STABLE VALUE, FOREIGN EQUITY ADRS)

Fields.Name: assetClass
Fields.Description: An asset class is a grouping of comparable financial securities. These include equities (stocks), fixed income (bonds), and cash equivalent or money market instruments. (DOMESTICBOND, LARGESTOCK, INTLSTOCK, MONEYMRKT, OTHER)

Fields.Name: currencyRate
Fields.Description: Currency rate, ratio of currency to original currency

Fields.Name: securityId
Fields.Description: The security ID of the transaction

Fields.Name: securityIdType
Fields.Description:
The security type. This field is related to the `securityId` field. Possible values:
* "CUSIP"

* "ISIN"

* "SEDOL"

* "SICC"

* "VALOR"

* "WKN"

Fields.Name: costBasisPerShare
Fields.Description: The per share cost of acquiring the security

Fields.Name: subAccountType
Fields.Description: The subaccount's type, such as cash

Fields.Name: securityCurrency
Fields.Description: Symbol for the currency that the account is being converted into

Fields.Name: todayGLDollar
Fields.Description: The current day's gain and loss of the position at the time of aggregation in dollars

Fields.Name: todayGLPercent
Fields.Description: The current day's gain and loss of the position at the time of aggregation in percentage

Nodes.Title: Customer Account Detail
Nodes.Name: CustomerAccountDetail
Nodes.Description: Additional customer account details. Not all data points will return for each account type. You can see the account type that each data point will return for in descriptions. The data point are also subject to availability by the institution.

Fields.Name: appDescription
Fields.Description: A short description of the app. This will be visible to end users in the FI interface.

Fields.Name: appName
Fields.Description: The name of the application assigned to the customer

Fields.Name: appUrl
Fields.Description: An URL for the app. This will be visible to end users in the FI interface.

Fields.Name: ownerAddressLine1
Fields.Description: An address line 1

Fields.Name: ownerAddressLine2
Fields.Description: An address line 2

Fields.Name: ownerCity
Fields.Description: City for the business entity that owns the app. Information for registration purposes only and not given to the end user.

Fields.Name: ownerCountry
Fields.Description: Country for the  business entity that owns the app. Information for registration purposes only and not given to the end user.

Fields.Name: ownerName
Fields.Description: Business name for the business entity that owns the app. Information for registration purposes only and not given to the end user.

Fields.Name: ownerPostalCode
Fields.Description: Zip code for the business entity that owns the app. Information for registration purposes only and not given to the end user.

Fields.Name: ownerState
Fields.Description: State for the business entity that owns the app. Information for registration purposes only and not given to the end user.

Fields.Name: image
Fields.Description: An app logo passed as a Base64 encoded image (1:1 SVG file, must be less than 50KB)

Example.Text:
{
  "appDescription": "The app that makes your budgeting experience awesome",
  "appName": "Awesome Budget App",
  "appUrl": "https://www.finicity.com/",
  "ownerAddressLine1": "434 W Ascension Way",
  "ownerAddressLine2": "Suite #200",
  "ownerCity": "Murray",
  "ownerCountry": "USA",
  "ownerName": "Finicity",
  "ownerPostalCode": "84123",
  "ownerState": "UT",
  "image": ""
}

Fields.Description: The status of an app registration request. "A" means approved. "P" means pending which is the status when initially submitted or when the app is modified and awaiting approval. "R" means rejected. If it is rejected there will be a note with the rejected reason.

Fields.Name: numberOfRecordsPerPage
Fields.Description: The number of results per page

Fields.Description: A list of applications with their statuses

Fields.Description: The status of an app registration request. "A" means approved. "P" means pending which is the status when initially submitted or when the app is modified and awaiting approval. "R" means rejected. If it is rejected there will be a note with the rejected reason.

Fields.Name: id
Fields.Description: The ID of a financial institution, represented as a number

Fields.Name: rssd
Fields.Description: The RSSD ID is a unique identifier assigned to financial institutions by the Federal Reserve. While the length of the RSSD ID varies by institution, it cannot exceed 10 numerical digits.

Fields.Name: name
Fields.Description: The name of the institution

Fields.Name: transAgg
Fields.Description:
"true": The institution is certified for the Transaction Aggregation product
"false": The institution is decertified for the Transaction Aggregation product

Fields.Name: ach
Fields.Description:
"true": The institution is certified for the ACH product
"false": The institution is decertified for the ACH product

Fields.Name: stateAgg
Fields.Description:
"true": The institution is certified for the Statement Aggregation product
"false": The institution is decertified for the Statement Aggregation product

Fields.Name: voi
Fields.Description:
"true": The institution is certified for the VOI product
"false": The institution is decertified for the VOI product

Fields.Name: voa
Fields.Description:
"true": The institution is certified for the VOA product
"false": The institution is decertified for the VOA product

Fields.Name: aha
Fields.Description:
"true": The institution is certified for the Account History Aggregation product
"false": The institution is decertified for the Account History Aggregation product

Fields.Name: availBalance
Fields.Description:
"true": The institution is certified for the Account Balance Check (ABC) product
"false": The institution is decertified for the Account Balance Check (ABC) product

Fields.Name: accountOwner
Fields.Description:
"true": The institution is certified for the Account Owner product
"false": The institution is decertified for the Account Owner product

Fields.Name: studentLoanData
Fields.Description:
"true": The institution is certified for the Student Loan Data product

"false": The institution is decertified for the Student Loan Data product

Fields.Name: loanPaymentDetails
Fields.Description:
"true": The institution is certified for the Loan Payment Detail product

"false": The institution is decertified for the Loan Payment Detail product

Fields.Name: childInstitutions
Fields.Description:
An array of child financial institutions
**Constraints**: *Minimum Items*: `0`

Fields.Name: status
Fields.Description: A report generation status. Possible values: "inProgress", "success", "failure".

Fields.Name: createdDate
Fields.Description: A date in Unix epoch time (in seconds). See: [Handling Epoch Dates and Times](https://docs.finicity.com/endpoint-syntax-and-format/).

Fields.Name: id
Fields.Description: A transaction ID

Fields.Name: amount
Fields.Description: The total amount of the transaction. Transactions for deposits are positive values, withdrawals and debits are negative values.

Fields.Name: accountId
Fields.Description: An account ID represented as a number

Fields.Name: customerId
Fields.Description: A customer ID represented as a number. See Add Customer API for how to create a customer ID.

Fields.Name: status
Fields.Description: One of "active", "pending", or "shadow" (see [Pending and Shadow Transactions](https://docs.finicity.com/pending-and-shadow-transactions/))

Fields.Name: description
Fields.Description: The description value is from the financial institution (FI), often known as the payee. The value "No description provided by institution" is returned when the FI doesn't provide one

Fields.Name: memo
Fields.Description: The institution must provide either a description, a memo, or both. We recommended concatenating the two fields into a single value.

Fields.Name: type
Fields.Description:
If provided by the institution, the following values may be returned in the field of a record:
* "atm"

* "cash"

* "check"

* "credit"

* "debit"

* "deposit"

* "directDebit"

* "directDeposit"

* "dividend"

* "fee"

* "interest"

* "other"

* "payment"

* "pointOfSale"

* "repeatPayment"

* "serviceCharge"

* "transfer"

Fields.Name: transactionDate
Fields.Description: A date in Unix epoch time (in seconds). Represents the timestamp of the transaction when it occurred. See: [Handling Epoch Dates and Times](https://docs.finicity.com/endpoint-syntax-and-format/).

Fields.Name: postedDate
Fields.Description: A date in Unix epoch time (in seconds). Represents the timestamp of the transaction when it was posted or cleared by the institution. This value isn't required for student loan transaction data. See: [Handling Epoch Dates and Times](https://docs.finicity.com/endpoint-syntax-and-format/).

Fields.Name: createdDate
Fields.Description: A date in Unix epoch time (in seconds). Represents the timestamp of the transaction when it was added to our platform. See: [Handling Epoch Dates and Times](https://docs.finicity.com/endpoint-syntax-and-format/).

Fields.Name: firstEffectiveDate
Fields.Description: A date in Unix epoch time (in seconds). Represents the first timestamp of the transaction recorded in the `effectiveDate` field. See: [Handling Epoch Dates and Times](https://docs.finicity.com/endpoint-syntax-and-format/).

Fields.Name: effectiveDate
Fields.Description: A date in Unix epoch time (in seconds). Represents the timestamp of the transaction when it became effective on an account by an institution. See: [Handling Epoch Dates and Times](https://docs.finicity.com/endpoint-syntax-and-format/).

Fields.Name: optionExpireDate
Fields.Description: A date in Unix epoch time (in seconds). Represents the timestamp of the transaction expiration date when it became expires on an account by an institution. See: [Handling Epoch Dates and Times](https://docs.finicity.com/endpoint-syntax-and-format/).

Fields.Name: checkNum
Fields.Description: The check number of the transaction

Fields.Name: escrowAmount
Fields.Description: The portion of the transaction allocated to escrow

Fields.Name: feeAmount
Fields.Description: The portion of the overall transaction amount applied to fees

Fields.Name: suspenseAmount
Fields.Description: Temporarily hold funds if you overpay or underpay your monthly payment

Fields.Name: interestAmount
Fields.Description: The portion of the transaction allocated to interest

Fields.Name: principalAmount
Fields.Description: The portion of the transaction allocated to principal

Fields.Name: optionStrikePrice
Fields.Description: The strike price of the option contract

Fields.Name: unitQuantity
Fields.Description: The number of units (individual shares) in the transaction

Fields.Name: unitPrice
Fields.Description: Share price for the investment unit: stocks, mutual funds, ETFs

Fields.Name: categorization
Fields.Description: Categorization Record

Fields.Name: runningBalanceAmount
Fields.Description: The ending balance after the transaction was posted

Fields.Name: subaccountSecurityType
Fields.Description: The type of sub account the funds came from

Fields.Name: commissionAmount
Fields.Description: Transaction commission

Fields.Name: ticker
Fields.Description: Ticker symbol for the investment related to the transaction

Fields.Name: investmentTransactionType
Fields.Description:
Keywords in the `description` and `memo` fields were used to translate investment transactions into these types.

Possible values: 
* "cancel"

* "purchaseToClose"

* "purchaseToCover"

* "contribution"

* "optionExercise"

* "optionExpiration"

* "fee"

* "soldToClose"

* "soldToOpen"

* "split"

* "transfer"

* "returnOfCapital"

* "income"

* "purchased"

* "sold"

* "dividendreInvest"

* "tax"

* "dividend"

* "reinvestOfIncome"

* "interest"

* "deposit"

* "otherInfo"

Fields.Name: taxesAmount
Fields.Description: Taxes applicable to the investment trade

Fields.Name: currencySymbol
Fields.Description: If the foreign amount value is present then this is the currency code of that foreign amount

Fields.Name: incomeType
Fields.Description: Capital gains applied in short, long, or miscellaneous terms for tax purposes

Fields.Name: splitDenominator
Fields.Description: Denominator of the stock split for the transaction

Fields.Name: splitNumerator
Fields.Description: Numerator of the stock split for the transaction

Fields.Name: sharesPerContract
Fields.Description: Shares per contract of the underlying stock option

Fields.Name: subAccountFund
Fields.Description: The sub account where the funds came from

Fields.Name: securityId
Fields.Description: The security ID of the transaction

Fields.Name: securityIdType
Fields.Description:
The security type. This field is related to the `securityId` field. Possible values:
* "CUSIP"

* "ISIN"

* "SEDOL"

* "SICC"

* "VALOR"

* "WKN"

Fields.Name: portfolioId
Fields.Description: A unique identifier that will be consistent across all reports created for the same customer

Fields.Name: reports
Fields.Description: A list of reports in the portfolio

Fields.Name: portfolioId
Fields.Description: A unique identifier that will be consistent across all reports created for the same customer

Fields.Name: reports
Fields.Description: A list of reports in the portfolio

Fields.Name: reports
Fields.Description: Data pertaining to each report

Fields.Name: assetId
Fields.Description: An asset ID. Generated by Connect or by using the Store Customer Pay Statement API.

Fields.Name: accounts
Fields.Description: An array of account IDs to be included in the report (all accounts will be included if not set)

Fields.Name: normalizedPayeeName
Fields.Description: A normalized payee, derived from the transaction's description and memo fields

* "ATM Fee"

Fields.Name: type
Fields.Description:
The list of supported account types.
* "checking": Standard checking
* "savings": Standard savings
* "cd": Certificates of deposit
* "moneyMarket": Money Market
* "creditCard": Standard credit cards
* "lineOfCredit": Home equity, line of credit
* "investment": Generic investment (no details)
* "investmentTaxDeferred": Generic tax-advantaged investment (no details)
* "employeeStockPurchasePlan": ESPP, Employee Stock Ownership Plans (ESOP), Stock Purchase Plans
* "ira": Individual Retirement Account (not Rollover or Roth)
* "401k": 401K Plan
* "roth": Roth IRA, Roth 401K
* "403b": 403B Plan
* "529plan": 529 Plan (True value is 529)
* "rollover": Rollover IRA
* "ugma": Uniform Gifts to Minors Act
* "utma": Uniform Transfers to Minors Act
* "keogh": Keogh Plan
* "457plan": 457 Plan (True value is 457)
* "401a": 401A Plan
* "brokerageAccount": Brokerage Account
* "educationSavings": Education Savings Account that is not a 529
* "healthSavingsAccount": HSA (Health Savings Accounts)
* "pension": Pension
* "profitSharingPlan": Profit Sharing Plan
* "roth401k": Roth 401K
* "sepIRA": Simplified Employee Pension IRA
* "simpleIRA": Simple IRA
* "thriftSavingsPlan": Thrift Savings Plan
* "variableAnnuity": Variable Annuity
* "cryptocurrency": Cryptocurrency Wallet, Cryptocurrency Account
* "mortgage": Standard Mortgages
* "loan": Auto loans, equity loans, other loans
* "studentLoan": Student Loan
* "studentLoanGroup": Student Loan Group
* "studentLoanAccount": Student Loan Account

Fields.Name: aggregationStatusCode
Fields.Description: The status of the most recent aggregation attempt for this account. Note: non-zero means the account was not accessed successfully for this report, and additional fields for this account may not be reliable.

Fields.Name: balance
Fields.Description: The cleared balance of the account as-of `balanceDate`

Fields.Name: balanceDate
Fields.Description: A timestamp showing when the balance was captured

Fields.Name: transactions
Fields.Description: a list of transaction records

Nodes.SuggestedLinkText: Cash Flow Possible Loan Deposits Account

Fields.Name: id
Fields.Description: A transaction ID

Fields.Name: amount
Fields.Description: The total amount of the transaction. Transactions for deposits are positive values, withdrawals and debits are negative values.

Fields.Name: postedDate
Fields.Description: A timestamp showing when the transaction was posted or cleared by the institution

Fields.Name: description
Fields.Description: The description of the transaction, as provided by the institution (often known as `payee`). In the event that this field is left blank by the institution, Finicity will pass a value of "No description provided by institution". All other values are provided by the institution.

Fields.Name: memo
Fields.Description: The memo field of the transaction, as provided by the institution. The institution must provide either a description, a memo, or both. It is recommended to concatenate the two fields into a single value.

Fields.Name: normalizedPayee
Fields.Description: A normalized payee, derived from the transaction's `description` and `memo` fields

Fields.Name: institutionTransactionId
Fields.Description: The unique identifier given by the FI for each transaction

Fields.Name: category
Fields.Description: One of the values from Categories (assigned based on the payee name)

Fields.Name: type
Fields.Description: One of the values from transaction types

Fields.Name: securityType
Fields.Description: The type of investment security (VOA only)

Fields.Name: symbol
Fields.Description: Investment symbol (VOA only)

Fields.Description: The ID of the account

Fields.Name: number
Fields.Description: The account number from the institution (all digits except the last four are obfuscated)

Fields.Name: ownerName
Fields.Description: The name of the account owner. If no owner information is available, this field won't appear in the report.

Fields.Name: ownerAddress
Fields.Description: The mailing address of the account owner. If no owner information is available, this field won't appear in the report.

Fields.Name: name
Fields.Description: The account name from the institution

Fields.Name: type
Fields.Description: One of the values from account types

Fields.Name: aggregationStatusCode
Fields.Description: The status of the most recent aggregation attempt

Fields.Name: balance
Fields.Description: The cleared balance of the account as-of `balanceDate`

Fields.Name: balanceDate
Fields.Description: A timestamp of the balance

Fields.Name: availableBalance
Fields.Description: Available balance

Fields.Name: averageMonthlyBalance
Fields.Description: The average monthly balance of the account

Fields.Name: totNumberInsufficientFundsFeeDebitTxAccount
Fields.Description: The count for the total number of insufficient funds transactions, based on the `fromDate` of the report

Fields.Name: totNumberInsufficientFundsFeeDebitTxOver6MonthsAccount
Fields.Description: The total number of  insufficient funds fees for the account over six months

Fields.Name: totNumberDaysSinceMostRecentInsufficientFundsFeeDebitTxAccount
Fields.Description: The total number of days since the most recent insufficient funds fee for the account

Fields.Name: transactions
Fields.Description: a list of transaction records

Fields.Description: The normalized category of the deductions in the format [type][number]. The number is the will be the iterating number of the type's occurrence starting at one.

Fields.Description: The deduction line's deduction type description

Fields.Name: amountCurrent
Fields.Description: The amount for the deduction line deducted from employee's pay for the specified pay period

Fields.Name: amountYTD
Fields.Description: The amount for the deduction line being deducted from the employee's pay for the current pay year

Fields.Name: type
Fields.Description: Categorization based on the deduction line's description

Fields.Name: name
Fields.Description: The normalized category of the earnings with a number appended. The number is the will be the iterating number of the type's occurrence starting at one.

Fields.Name: type
Fields.Description:
The categorization based on the earning line's description. Possible values:
* "bereavement"

* "bonus"

* "commission"

* "holiday"

* "jury duty"

* "overtime"

* "pension"

* "pto"

* "regular"

* "sick"

* "tips"

* "unknown"

* "vacation"

* "reimbursement"

* "stock"

* "benefit"

Fields.Name: description
Fields.Description: The earnings line's pay type description

Fields.Name: amountCurrent
Fields.Description: The amount for the earning line paid out to the employee for the specified pay period.

Fields.Name: amountYTD
Fields.Description: The amount for the earning line being paid out to the employee for the current pay year.

Fields.Description: The name of the payroll source where the data was retrieved

Fields.Name: payFrequency
Fields.Description:
The current pay frequency:
* `Daily`
* `Weekly`
* `Bi-Weekly`
* `Bi-Weekly Odd` (Bi-Weekly pay on odd weeks)
* `Bi-Weekly Even` (Bi-Weekly pay on even weeks)
* `Semi-Monthly`
* `Monthly`
* `Quarterly`
* `Semi-Annual`
* `Annual`
* `Every 2.6 wks`
* `Every 4 wks`
* `Every 5.2 wks`

Fields.Name: name
Fields.Description: Full name of the employee: first, middle (if stated), and last name

Fields.Description: First name of employee

Fields.Name: middleName
Fields.Description: Middle name of employee, if stated

Fields.Name: familyName
Fields.Description: Last name of employee

Fields.Name: address
Fields.Description: Array of addresses

Fields.Name: address1
Fields.Description: Employer address as stated by the employer in the payroll system

Fields.Name: city
Fields.Description: Employer city as stated by the employer in the payroll system

Fields.Name: state
Fields.Description: Employer state as stated by the employer in the payroll system

Fields.Name: zip
Fields.Description: Employer zip code as stated by the employer in the payroll system

Fields.Name: employerName
Fields.Description: Name of the employer as stated by the employer in the payroll system

Fields.Name: legalEntityId
Fields.Description: Employer identification number (EIN)

Fields.Name: originalHireDate
Fields.Description: The original hired date of an employee at the company

Fields.Name: latestHireDate
Fields.Description: If an employee leaves the company and returns later, then the employer states the latest hire date at the company

Fields.Name: latestPayDate
Fields.Description: The most recent pay date from an employer

Fields.Name: daysSinceLastPay
Fields.Description: The number of days since an employee was last paid

Fields.Name: numberPayCadenceWithoutPay
Fields.Description: The number of pay cadences an employee has not been paid; determined by the pay frequency

Fields.Name: employmentEndDate
Fields.Description: The date an employee ended their employment at the company

Fields.Name: employmentDuration
Fields.Description: The length of time an employee has been employed with that employer in ISO 8601 format (eg P1Y6M0D)

Fields.Name: employerAddress
Fields.Description: Array of addresses

Fields.Name: employmentStatusCode
Fields.Description: Status codes: `A` - Active, `NLE` - No Longer Employed, `L` - Leave

Fields.Name: employmentStatusName
Fields.Description: Status name: `Active`, `No Longer Employed`, or `Leave`

Fields.Name: workLevelCode
Fields.Description: The abbreviate code for the employment level names (workLevelName) that we receive from the employer

Fields.Name: workLevelName
Fields.Description: The employment level name is whatever we receive from the employer, such as full time, part time, temp, contractor, and more

Fields.Name: workLevelStatus
Fields.Description:
The categorized work level status. Enumerations are:
* `Temporary`
* `Seasonal`
* `Retired`
* `Student`
* `Full Time`
* `Part Time`
* `Unspecified`
This is a new field, currently enabled only for testing reports. It will be added for all reports in August 2021.

Fields.Description: Employee state as stated by the employer in the payroll system

Fields.Name: paystatementReport

Fields.Name: reportCustomFields
Fields.Description:
The `reportCustomFields` parameter is used when experiences are associated with a credit decisioning report.

Designate up to 5 custom fields that you'd like associated with the report when it's generated. Every custom field consists of three variables: `label`, `value`, and `shown`. The `shown` variable is "true" or "false".
* "true": (default) display the custom field in the PDF report
* "false": don't display the custom field in the PDF report

For an experience that generates multiple reports, the `reportCustomFields` parameter gets passed to all reports.

All custom fields display in the Reseller Billing API.

Fields.Name: accountIds
Fields.Description: A whitespace-separated list of account IDs to be included in the report (all accounts will be included if not set)

Fields.Name: reportCustomFields

* "true": (default) display the custom field in the PDF report
* "false": don't display the custom field in the PDF report

For an experience that generates multiple reports, the `reportCustomFields` parameter gets passed to all reports.

All custom fields display in the Reseller Billing API.

* Total number of NSF funds

* Days since the most recent NFS funds fee

Fields.Name: accountIds
Fields.Description: A whitespace-separated list of account IDs to be included in the report (all accounts will be included if not set)

Fields.Name: reportCustomFields
Fields.Description:
The `reportCustomFields` parameter is used when experiences are associated with a credit decisioning report.

Designate up to 5 custom fields that you'd like associated with the report when it's generated. Every custom field consists of three variables: `label`, `value`, and `shown`. The `shown` variable is "true" or "false".
* "true": (default) display the custom field in the PDF report
* "false": don't display the custom field in the PDF report

For an experience that generates multiple reports, the `reportCustomFields` parameter gets passed to all reports.

All custom fields display in the Reseller Billing API.

Fields.Name: fromDate
Fields.Description: A date in Unix epoch time (in seconds). See: [Handling Epoch Dates and Times](https://docs.finicity.com/endpoint-syntax-and-format/).

Fields.Name: incomeStreamConfidenceMinimum
Fields.Description: Include income streams in the report, based on the income stream's confidence score. For example, Use the value 50 to include only income streams with a confidence score of 50 or higher.

Fields.Description: Include income streams in the report, based on the income stream's confidence score. For example, Use the value 50 to include only income streams with a confidence score of 50 or higher.

Fields.Name: reportId
Fields.Description: A report ID

Fields.Name: accountIds
Fields.Description: An array of account IDs to be included in the report (all accounts will be included if not set)

Fields.Name: reportCustomFields
Fields.Description:
The `reportCustomFields` parameter is used when experiences are associated with a credit decisioning report.

Designate up to 5 custom fields that you'd like associated with the report when it's generated. Every custom field consists of three variables: `label`, `value`, and `shown`. The `shown` variable is "true" or "false".
* "true": (default) display the custom field in the PDF report
* "false": don't display the custom field in the PDF report

For an experience that generates multiple reports, the `reportCustomFields` parameter gets passed to all reports.

All custom fields display in the Reseller Billing API.

Fields.Name: incomeStreamConfidenceMinimum
Fields.Description: Include income streams in the report, based on the income stream's confidence score. For example, Use the value 50 to include only income streams with a confidence score of 50 or higher.

Fields.Name: id

Fields.Description: The name(s) of the account owner(s), retrieved from the institution.

Fields.Description: The mailing address of the account owner, retrieved from the institution.

Fields.Name: name
Fields.Description: The account name from the institution

Fields.Name: number
Fields.Description: The account number from the institution (obfuscated)

Fields.Name: type
Fields.Description: CFR: `ALL` (`checking` / `savings` / `loan` / `mortgage` / `credit card` / `CD` / `MM` / `investment`...)

Fields.Name: aggregationStatusCode
Fields.Description: The status of the most recent aggregation attempt for this account (non-zero means the account was not accessed successfully for this report, and additional fields for this account may not be reliable)

Fields.Name: currentBalance
Fields.Description: The cleared balance of the account as-of `balanceDate`

Fields.Name: availableBalance
Fields.Description: Available balance

Fields.Name: balanceDate
Fields.Description: A timestamp showing when the `balance` was captured

Fields.Name: transactions
Fields.Description: a list of transaction records

Fields.Name: balance
Fields.Description: The cleared balance of the account as-of `balanceDate`

Fields.Name: averageMonthlyBalance
Fields.Description: The average monthly balance of the account

Fields.Name: totNumberInsufficientFundsFeeDebitTxAccount
Fields.Description: The count for the total number of insufficient funds transactions, based on the `fromDate` of the report

Fields.Name: totNumberInsufficientFundsFeeDebitTxOver6MonthsAccount
Fields.Description: The total number of  insufficient funds fees for the account over six months

Fields.Name: totNumberDaysSinceMostRecentInsufficientFundsFeeDebitTxAccount
Fields.Description: The total number of days since the most recent insufficient funds fee for the account

Fields.Name: totNumberInsufficientFundsFeeDebitTxOver2MonthsAccount
Fields.Description: The count for the total number of insufficient funds transactions for the last two months, based on the `fromDate` of the report.

Fields.Name: incomeStreams
Fields.Description: A list of income stream records

Fields.Name: beginningBalance
Fields.Description: Beginning balance of account per the time period in the report

Fields.Name: id
Fields.Description: Income stream ID

Fields.Name: name
Fields.Description: A human-readable name based on the `normalizedPayee` name of the transactions for this income stream

Fields.Name: status
Fields.Description: Possible values: "ACTIVE", "INACTIVE"

Fields.Name: estimateInclusion
Fields.Description: Possible values: "HIGH", "MODERATE", "LOW", "NO"

Fields.Name: confidence
Fields.Description: Level of confidence that the deposit stream represents income (example: 85%)

Fields.Name: netMonthly
Fields.Description: A list of net monthly records. One instance for each complete calendar month in the report.

Fields.Name: netAnnual
Fields.Description: Sum of all values in `netMonthlyIncome` over the previous 12 months

Fields.Name: projectedNetAnnual
Fields.Description: Projected net income over the next 12 months, across all income streams, based on `netAnnualIncome`

Fields.Name: estimatedGrossAnnual
Fields.Description: Before-tax gross annual income (estimated from `netAnnual`) across all income stream in the past 12 months

Fields.Name: projectedGrossAnnual
Fields.Description: Projected gross income over the next 12 months, across all active income streams, based on `projectedNetAnnual`

Fields.Name: averageMonthlyIncomeNet
Fields.Description: Monthly average amount over the previous 24 months

Fields.Name: incomeStreamMonths
Fields.Description: The number of months the income transactions are observed

Fields.Name: transactions
Fields.Description: A list of transaction records

Fields.Name: daysSinceLastTransaction
Fields.Description: The number of days since the last credit transaction for the particular income stream

Fields.Name: nextExpectedTransactionDate
Fields.Description: The next expected credit transaction date for the particular income stream, based on the cadence

Fields.Name: payPeriod
Fields.Description: The pay period of the pay statement

Fields.Name: billable
Fields.Description: Designates whether the pay statement is billable

Fields.Name: assetId
Fields.Description: The asset ID of the stored pay statement

Fields.Name: payDate
Fields.Description: The listed pay date for the pay statement

Fields.Name: startDate
Fields.Description: The beginning of the pay period

Fields.Name: endDate
Fields.Description: The end of the pay period

Fields.Name: netPayCurrent
Fields.Description: The total pay after deductions for the employee for the current pay period

Fields.Name: netPayYTD
Fields.Description: The total accumulation of pay after deductions for the employee for the current pay year

Fields.Name: grossPayCurrent
Fields.Description: The total pay before deductions for the employee for the current pay period

Fields.Name: grossPayYTD
Fields.Description: The total accumulation of pay before deductions for the employee for the current pay year

Fields.Name: payrollProvider
Fields.Description: The company that provides the pay stub.

Fields.Name: payStat
Fields.Description: Information pertaining to the earnings on the pay statement

Fields.Name: deductions
Fields.Description: Information pertaining to deductions on the pay statement

Fields.Name: directDeposits
Fields.Description: Information pertaining to direct deposits on the pay statement

Fields.Name: institutions
Fields.Description: Not populated for the voieWithStatement style of paystub report. For the VOIE - Paystub (with TXVerify) reports this would include details of the financial institution accounts and income streams with matching transactions to the pay statement.

Fields.Name: errorCode
Fields.Description: Error code for the asset

Fields.Name: errorMessage
Fields.Description: Error message for the asset
